item.title: 【Requests】[REQ CAP] - Madonna, The Celebration Tour In Rio (RE-RUN)
item.description:
Hello brazilian cappers!

Reaching out again about Madonna (sorry about that!) but, there were some glitches on the LIVE version of the broadcast and we think on the re-run they may be fixed.

Multishow will broadcast the concert again on Saturday (May 11) at 10:30pm (BRT) and once again on Sunday (May 12) at 8pm (BRT).

Would be much appreciated if you can manage to share that with us, maybe with 5.1 audio? Not sure how Multishow handles its concert broadcasts.

Thanks in advance!
item.author: vitoralmeida
